images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, featuring a stunning beach scene with palm trees and a sunset, evoking feelings of relaxation and adventure.
AI-selected This destination image will highlight Thailand's vibrant culture and cuisine, showcasing colorful Thai street food and local markets to enhance the culinary experience.
AI-selected These promotional icons will be used to highlight special offers and discounts related to travel packages to Thailand during the autumn season.
AI-selected These promotional icons will be used to highlight special offers and discounts related to travel packages to Thailand during the autumn season.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to reinforce brand identity and trustworthiness in the email marketing campaign.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: A stunning Thai beach scene with palm trees and a sunset, evoking feelings of warmth and relaxation.

assetRequirements.purpose: showcase the beauty of Thailand's beaches
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of Thai street food and local culture to inspire travel.

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Откройте для себя Тайланд осенью — экзотика и низкие цены!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, featuring a stunning beach scene with palm trees and a sunset, evoking feelings of relaxation and adventure.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
